sourcesContent:
import React from 'react'
import { Card, } from 'react-bootstrap'

const Product = ({product}) => {
    return (
        <>
            <Card>
                <Card.Img variant="top" src={product.image} style={{maxHeight: '240px', width: 'auto'}}/>
                <Card.Body>
                    <Card.Title>
                        {product.name}
                    </Card.Title> 
                </Card.Body>
            </Card>
        </>
    )
}

export default Product
